p:
Here we propose the synthesis of nickel-iron layered double hydroxides (NiFe-LDHs), α-Ni 1− x Fe
x (OH) 2 by a simple and easily scalable one step co-precipitation method, without any additives or surfactants. The proposed α-Ni 1− x Fe
x (OH) 2 material is then expected to reduce the cost of materials by increasing the storage capacity per Ni atom, to improve the high rate performance and the energy efficiency of the hybrid Ni/Fe battery by an enhanced OER activity and conductivity (without using Co), and finally to limit structural fatigue induced by lattice expansions.
